channel.title: Blind Man builds home
channel.description:
http://www.nbcnews.com/video/nbc-news/52705996
As a visually impaired individual it's always good to see the legally blind/fully blind members doing something that others state they cannot do. This made me smile and I wanted to share. :)
My dad always told me you could do anything you put your mind too and well that video right there proves it to me.

item.title: Blind Man builds home
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

i cant even build a room lawl

item.title: Blind Man builds home
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:10, topic:528454”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=647207.msg4352584#msg4352584 date=1376932075]
so yes, again, most blind people can see a bit, since there are more people that are legally blind than fully blind, and as you stated for me, people that are legally blind can see
[/quote]this man is 100% blind so I fail to see where you are trying to come from lol

Even then, you won’t see just any visisually impared/legally blind person building a house.[/quote]

oh that response was directly to the post above mine (yours) and not about this specific man’s impairment

anyways, i’m going to let this discussion about blindness end here, as everything that needs to be stated has been, i’ll let this thread get back on topic now!

Read full topic

item.title: Blind Man builds home
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:6, topic:528454”]Most blind people can see a little bit.[/quote]that…doesn’t even make sense.

There is a difference between

“legally blind”

and

“fully blind”

I.e. I am legally blind. Being legally blind just means you can’t see anything more than 20/200 in the aspect of figuring out the shape of an object/reading text.

20/200 is like I think the last time I checked that was about 24-26 font type? I see about 20/300 and require about 30-31 font type for most documents.

Being fully blind means you have one or more eye where there is ZERO capacity to see out of. Yes, some people do recognize light but that’s about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Blind Man builds home
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493

Most blind people can see a little bit.

[quote=“Strucker, post:2, topic:528454”]LOL i didn’t see him in action[/quote]You would have to see him in action but he seems to know what he is doing/confident he can do it.

[hr]

[quote=“Strucker, post:4, topic:528454”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=647207.msg4352526#msg4352526 date=1376921335]
I bet there were a lot of sore thumbs from hammers on that job.
[/quote]++[/quote]++ x 2 lol

I know I would never try to do something like that and I have at least a little vision! :eek:
